title: Stabilization of the cubic, fast-ion conducting phase of Li7La3Sn2O12 garnet by gallium doping
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,7557-7563
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08968A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Hany El-Shinawi, Shady M. El-Dafrawy, Mahmoud Tarek, Ahmed F. S. Molouk, Edmund J. Cussen, Serena A. Cussen
A novel, cubic fast-ion conducting modification of Li7La3Sn2O12 (LLSO) has been stabilized by gallium doping, with no doping at the Sn sites.
